segments.text: Good afternoon Sir , may I please see your passport and reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry sir , this flight has been cancelled due to some mechanical problems .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cancelled ! So what am I supposed to do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We apologize for any inconveniences that may be caused by this . If your flight is urgent , I can put you on a waiting list for another flight this evening , but it's on a first come first served basis , so there is no guarantee that you will be able to take that flight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , If you can wait until tomorrow , we will put you up in a hotel for today and you can take scheduled flight for tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . I'll do that then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your understanding sir . I will book your flight now .
segments.speaker: S1
